answers.answer: Also i feel like am gona b sick alot more then usual n sory tmi av had loose bowel movements
Shelly,  you need to report this to your doctor or midwife.These are symptoms of preeclampsia.Swelling in ankles and feet is more normal,  but sudden swelling in face and headaches are a concern.
I had pre eclampsia in 1st pregnancy and all the signs in 2nd do u really fink i cud gt it agen
Yes. If you've had it before it's likely you'll have it again.It's certainly worth mentioning to your health care provider -Best wishes.
